data.message: Hurt me check o; ur were my center but you managed to fuck that up too, grass is greener on my side, ours, mine yours and you you you, I I I , me me me back wards spells em em em, not waiting for you. I don't go back I go to better places with greater opportunity Jackson timberlake talk shit,do the reach out program and knock ur ass to the ground like kat Williams got his ass kicked straight down on the ground...lmao lol, see u soon but not soon enough.does anyone really no your ass I do....do any of these ppl really know u if they did they probably wouldn't like you.check o!!!!! Just speaking truth ....
